experience: You and Eshant both know Erika Flora PMP, PgMP, ITIL Expert,PRINCE2,CSP, Richard Krakora, and 32 others

Responsibilities•	Owner and single point of contact for all 68 SSIS packages.•	Migrated all 68 packages from SSIS 2008  to SSIS 2014 version.•	Redesigned data flow structure according to VFK business needs and introduced ODS concepts in design. •	Optimizing and restructuring packages as per new data flow design. •	design and develop complex T-SQL ad-hoc scripts, including cleanup and roll back scripts as needed.•	Provide coding and environment support for SQL Database Development team.•	Recommend changes to the relational data model to solve performance issues with T-SQL•	Develop, support and maintain staging, operational data store and the data warehouse infrastructure.

•	Responsible for overall database development and performance across all 5 scrum boards.•	Assist Data scientists in Power Pivot reports and SSAS Tabular.•	Develops and maintains the SSIS ETL design from an enterprise perspective. Understands the complexity behind the data model and data quality to support build enterprise wide data architectures.•	Write and maintain Operational and Analytical SSRS Reports•	Provide inputs on HLD, and review/validate the LLD of  Database modules/changes.•	Evaluate current database environments, provide strategic and tactical recommendations that will meet current and future business needs.•	Provide ongoing suggestions for improvement and innovation within the department.

•	Develop data extractors and loaders, Manage the data conversion process and data push process to the various development/production environments.•	Created many SSRS dashboard reports for Immediate management, business analysts and direct clients.•	Maintaining Internal SSRS reports and SQL Scripts and Produce reports for clients and internal staff using SSRS.•	Perform ad hoc queries and assists in the development of reports based in response to internal and external requests using Microsoft SQL Server and SSRS•	Supports data integration and enterprise Business Intelligence initiatives and projects.•	Responsible for data management and conversion activities such as Data Assessment, cleansing, extracting, migrating and reconciliation of data using SSIS.

•	Provide inputs on HLD, and review/validate the LLD of  DB modules.•	Design, develop, enhance and optimize store procedures, triggers, functions and other database objects.•	Configure domain registry for email, sms alerts and priority attributes in cheetah mail system.•	Review client requirements, perform gap and  impact analysis, and provide inputs in creating the detailed schedule.•	Provide strategic and tactical direction in the area of database management and maintenance of enterprise data and database infrastructure.•	Evaluate current database environments and make recommendations that will meet current and future business needs.•	Make changes in existing SSIS packages and assist in the ongoing development of technical best practices for data movement, data quality, data cleansing and other ETL related activities•	Assist application development teams with planning and implementing database changes as well as query/job optimization.•	Proactively identify and act on opportunities to improve database systems and Processes.•	Provide ongoing suggestions for improvement and innovation within the department.

•	Design, Implement and maintain database schema, tables, stored procedures, UDFs, triggers, constraints, Indexes, schemas, functions, views, rules and other database objects•	Monitoring, optimizing and tuning of queries and other SQL Server database objects. •	Created, configured, maintained and optimized SSIS ETL packages to clean, validate, standardize and move data from DM (Data management)  OLTP environment  to RM (Relational management) OLAP environment.•	Develops and maintains the ETL design from an enterprise perspective. Understands the complexity behind the data model and data quality to support build enterprise wide data architectures.•	Develop data extractors and loaders, Manage the data conversion process and data push process to the various development/production environments.•	Created many SSRS dashboard reports for Immediate management, business analysts and direct clients.•	Maintaining Internal SSRS reports and SQL Scripts and Produce reports for clients and internal staff using SSRS.•	Perform ad hoc queries and assists in the development of reports based in response to internal and external requests using Microsoft SQL Server and SSRS•	Supports data integration and enterprise Business Intelligence initiatives and projects.•	Understand the project vision and requirements, and contribute to the creation of the supplemental requirements, building the low-level technical specifications for a particular platform and/or service solution•	Ensure new features are modeled to integrate with existing application and provide a consistent data model.•	Provide direction on adoption of new technologies and best industry practices in the field of data architecture and modeling.•	Collaborate with business analysts source system experts and other team members to determine data extraction and transformation requirements•	Maintain and enhance SSAS cube ‘Fusion’ functionality by editing/adding dimensions, attributes, hierarchies and aggregations.

• Won 1st Prize in VIRUS2K6 (Inter university tech fest) in event of Dream Coders (overnight C programming)• Won 2nd Prize in GATE2K4 (Inter university tech fest) in event of Black Belt (C/C++ programming)

summary: I am Microsoft Certified Specialist in SQL Server who's been working in Analysis, Design, Development, Maintenance and Support of large (10 TB+) SQL Server databases 2000-2016 from last 10+ years. Specialties:  - SQL Server performance tuning and Query optimization  - Designing and Implementing Relational and Multidimensional Databases.  - Power pivot, SSRS Reporting, SSAS Tabular model  - ETL through SSIS packages  - Microsoft SQL Server 2008/2012/2014/2016, Erwin, T-SQL, BIDS, SSRS, SSIS, SSAS,  Profiler, Tuning Advisor, SQLSentry, Office 365 Power BI, SQL Sever Data Tools (SSDT)Database Design, Development and Optimization•	Excellent in complex T-SQL skills including distributed queries and advance SQLCLR code•	In depth understanding of Index analysis and strategies •	Experience in Database performance tuning and query optimization(PTO)MSBI Design, Development and optimization•	Experience on reporting tool like SSRS, ETL tool like SSIS, DTS, SSAS and OLAP environment using Microsoft BIDS.•	Experience in SSIS performance tuning techniques like optimizing buffer Size, Buffer usage, Execution trees and  Parallelism.•	Experienced in generating on-demand and scheduled reports for business analysis or management decisions using Microsoft SSRS.•	Knowledge on creating dashboard using SSRS and other Microsoft office 365 power BI tools like power pivot, power query, power view, power map and other BI end user tools like Tableau.•	Experience in deploy, process and build SSAS cubes, maintaining and enhancing aggregations, dimension, attributes, hierarchies, KPI’s perspective, partition and measures using BIDS tools.Certification and others•	Microsoft Certified Technology specialist (MCTS) – SQL Server 2008, Database development•	Microsoft Certified IT Professional (MCITP) – SQL Server 2005, Database Administrator•	Practitioner of Agile Methodologies such as Scrum, Extreme Programming (XP) and Test Driven Development (TDD)
